DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a relationship exists between EtCO2 and carboxyhemoglobin levels in carbon monoxide exposure. Our hypothesis is that a liner relationship exists between EtCO2 and carboxyhemoglobin in carbon monoxide poisoning.
DOC.brief_title: End-Tidal Carbon Dioxide as a Measure of Carboxyhemoglobin in Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
DOC.criteria: Carbon monoxide exposure Less than 18 years old Suicide attempt Unable to provide informed consent Pregnant
